Set of tools for calculating energy efficiency in industrial equipment

11 #include <cmath>
12 #include "calculator/pump/OptimalPrePumpEff.h"
13 
14 double OptimalPrePumpEff::calculate() {
15  /*
16  * DOUBLE_SUCTION
17  */
18  const double jCoeff[5][2] = {{90.190375, 91.0},
19  {-7.8068742, -3.6664629},
20  {0.00033366482, 0.0001264433},
21  {-8.1364684, -14.697275},
22  {0.0026659434, 0.00072855045}};
23  /*
24  * VERTICAL_TURBINE
25  */
26  const double vCoeff[5][3] = {{87.456119, 89.899894, 90.124016},
27  {-9.3556039, -5.9800814, -1.7332611},
28  {0.00067139092, 0.00019480643, 0.00014953651},
29  {-9.4309496, -7.0638099, -3.3197451},
30  {0.0039344122, 0.0010440162, 0.00015232542}};
31  /*
32  * LARGE_END_SUCTION
33  */
34  const double gCoeff[5] = {90.379274,
35  -3.000737,
36  0.000034054964,
37  -4.818246,
38  0.00019083831};
39  /*
40  * END_SUCTION_ANSI_API
41  */
42  const double fCoeff[5][2] = {{84.655455, 87.748473},
43  {-18.706336, -7.6842423},
44  {0.0016056629, 0.0003739105},
45  {-20.655962, -17.336122},
46  {0.0081197589, 0.0024096967}};
47  /*
48  * MULTISTAGE_BOILER_FEED
49  */
50  const double eCoeff[5][2] = {{84.286574, 87.129684},
51  {-17.836167, -7.8144274},
52  {0.0013236525, 0.00034998448},
53  {-26.951966, -19.605637},
54  {0.0068256307, 0.0022387671}};
55  /*
56  * API_DOUBLE_SUCTION
57  * and
58  * END_SUCTION_STOCK
59  */
60  const double dhCoeff[5][2] = {{87.199887, 90.158464},
61  {-10.580842, -4.8350009},
62  {0.00027878405, 0.000048652395},
63  {-23.785033, -7.2881572},
64  {0.0018831236, 0.00027630687}};
65  /*
66  * END_SUCTION_SUBMERSIBLE_SEWAGE
67  * and
68  * END_SUCTION_SEWAGE
69  */
70  const double bcCoeff[5][2] = {{83.528143, 89.704526},
71  {-23.543231, -6.9708815},
72  {0.00071315587, 0.000057096295},
73  {-37.584938, -13.868089},
74  {0.005809375, 0.00046766436}};
75  /*
76  * END_SUCTION_SLURRY
77  */
78  const double aCoeff[5][2] = {{79.096487, 85.957484},
79  {-32.006283, -15.256678},
80  {0.00084199445, 0.00017627657},
81  {-23.100062, -24.920847},
82  {0.0064912714, 0.0012055457}};
83 
84  /*
85  * Below format has been kept to mimic the excel sheet. There must be a better way to do this.
86  */
87 
88  int range = 0;
89  switch (style) {
90  case Pump::Style::DOUBLE_SUCTION:
91  range = (flowRate < 9000) ? 0 : 1;
92  return jCoeff[0][range] + (jCoeff[1][range] * std::exp(-jCoeff[2][range] * flowRate) +
93  jCoeff[3][range] * std::exp(-jCoeff[4][range] * flowRate));
94 
95  case Pump::Style::VERTICAL_TURBINE:
96  case Pump::Style::AXIAL_FLOW:
97  if (flowRate < 2550) {
98  range = 0;
99  } else {
100  range = (flowRate < 7220) ? 1 : 2;
101  }
102  return vCoeff[0][range] + (vCoeff[1][range] * std::exp(-vCoeff[2][range] * flowRate) +
103  vCoeff[3][range] * std::exp(-vCoeff[4][range] * flowRate));
104 
105  case Pump::Style::LARGE_END_SUCTION:
106  return gCoeff[0] + (gCoeff[1] * std::exp(-gCoeff[2] * flowRate) +
107  gCoeff[3] * std::exp(-gCoeff[4] * flowRate));
108 
109  case Pump::Style::END_SUCTION_ANSI_API:
110  range = (flowRate < 1030) ? 0 : 1;
111  return fCoeff[0][range] + (fCoeff[1][range] * std::exp(-fCoeff[2][range] * flowRate) +
112  fCoeff[3][range] * std::exp(-fCoeff[4][range] * flowRate));
113 
114  case Pump::Style::MULTISTAGE_BOILER_FEED:
115  range = (flowRate < 890) ? 0 : 1;
116  return eCoeff[0][range] + (eCoeff[1][range] * std::exp(-eCoeff[2][range] * flowRate) +
117  eCoeff[3][range] * std::exp(-eCoeff[4][range] * flowRate));
118 
119  case Pump::Style::END_SUCTION_STOCK:
120  case Pump::Style::API_DOUBLE_SUCTION:
121  range = (flowRate < 4440) ? 0 : 1;
122  return dhCoeff[0][range] + (dhCoeff[1][range] * std::exp(-dhCoeff[2][range] * flowRate) +
123  dhCoeff[3][range] * std::exp(-dhCoeff[4][range] * flowRate));
124 
125  case Pump::Style::END_SUCTION_SEWAGE:
126  case Pump::Style::END_SUCTION_SUBMERSIBLE_SEWAGE:
127  range = (flowRate < 2170) ? 0 : 1;
128  return bcCoeff[0][range] + (bcCoeff[1][range] * std::exp(-bcCoeff[2][range] * flowRate) +
129  bcCoeff[3][range] * std::exp(-bcCoeff[4][range] * flowRate));
130 
131  case Pump::Style::END_SUCTION_SLURRY:
132  range = (flowRate < 1690) ? 0 : 1;
133  return aCoeff[0][range] + (aCoeff[1][range] * std::exp(-aCoeff[2][range] * flowRate) +
134  aCoeff[3][range] * std::exp(-aCoeff[4][range] * flowRate));
135 
136  }
137 
138 }
